thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express New York - Manhattan West Side - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: March winter storm 2016
thread.title_full: March winter storm 2016 - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York - Manhattan West Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Vaant1
title: March winter storm 2016
text:
My girlfriend and I stayed here primarily for the location since it's only a 15 minute walk from the Jarvits center where my girlfriend was attending Barbercon. It's also only a few blocks from Times Square and centrally located near lots of bars and restaurants.
The room was clean, 'cozy' (like everywhere in the city) but big enough for us, nice shower etc.
There's a small gym on the ground floor with the basics; couple of treadmills, an elliptical and bike, enough to get some cardio in.
The staff are extremely accommodating, we were worried about not being able to travel home due to the big snow storm we were scheduled to get and the manager told us they'd make sure they were able to book us an extra night if needed or even cancel our second night if we needed to leave early! We ended up doing neither and left when planned but the fact they were going to go out of their way for us was fantastic, especially considering friends of ours staying at another much more expensive hotel DID need to leave early and their hotel wouldn't let them cancel their room because 'it never snows in NYC'?!
The morning of our departure the staff at Holiday Inn even called our room to double check we still had our travel plans, making sure we didn't need to book another night before they were all booked up!
We go to NYC once every year and will definitely be coming back here again next year. The location, price, and staff can't be beat.
